nope sorry i like the way i type ok? i really like it alot and its much much ezier ( or in your tongue easier) c (see) how much funner and ezier (easier)it is!!?? now , i hate to sound rude, but will U (YOU) plz (please) shut up and let ppl(people) talk or type like they want to!! and there r (are) lots of other ppl (people) that type like this and no one ever says ne(any) thing!! now leave us alone!!!!!

d00ds than others*
